name: Rocket Bits
description:
Rocket Bits is a 1-bit adventure-ey type game where you control a group of rockets in order to try and bring them back to their ship, so they can fly it safely back  to their mothership.

Rockets look towaards your mouse cursor but only propel themselves in that direction when you click. See how you can use this to bring them safely through obstacles to the ship.

Donating $1 or more gives you access to some wallpapers and a download of the OST
